definitions.title: n.pr.f.
definitions.body: Sarouia: mother of Abishai, Joab and Asahel;—´[[ח]] 1Sa 26:6 +, [[חְרֻיׇה]] 2Sa 14:1, 2Sa 16:10, 2Sa 23:37; —acc. to 1Ch 2:16 a she was David's sister; called [[אֵם יוֹאָב]] 2Sa 17:25; elsewh. after cstr. [[בֶּן־]] ([[בְּנֵי]]): ´[[בֶּן־ח]] of Abishai 1Sa 26:6, 2Sa 16:9, 2Sa 18:2, 2Sa 19:22, 2Sa 21:17, 1Ch 18:12; of Joab 2Sa 2:13, 2Sa 8:16 = 1Ch 18:15, 2Sa 14:1, 2Sa 23:18 and v:2Sa 23:37 = 1Ch 11:39, 1Ki 1:7, 1Ki 2:5, 1Ki 2:22, 1Ch 11:6, 1Ch 26:28, 1Ch 27:24; pl. of all three 2Sa 2:18, 1Ch 2:16; Abishai and Joab 2Sa 3:39, 2Sa 16:10, 2Sa 19:23.
